text:
Drammen scantlings, which were cleared at 5 3/4d. for 6x2, 5 1/2d. for 5x2, and 4 1/2d. for 4x2, all per lineal foot. Taking into account the fact of the partially unrestful character of the sale and the very unfavourable weather, the result may be considered highly satisfactory and shows a considerable strength in the market, even under the weight of the recent heavy importations.
